briefTitle: Study to Evaluate the Efficacy, Tolerability and Safety of Octanorm in Patients With Primary Immunodeficiency Diseases
officialTitle: Clinical Phase 3 Study to Evaluate the Efficacy, Tolerability and Safety of Subcutaneous Human Immunoglobulin (Octanorm) in Patients With Primary Immunodeficiency Diseases.
summary: Clinical phase 3 study to evaluate the efficacy, tolerability and safety of subcutaneous human immunoglobulin (octanorm) in patients with primary immunodeficiency diseases.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Serious Bacterial Infections Per Person-Year on Treatment
